betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The dealings of the Old Ones are ceaseless, to them enemies and friends are alike; in their eyes, anyone and everyone can be used.
With regards to the deal between J'Zahar and the Meatball Man, there were others involved, other Old Ones. They did not willingly enter this pact, and their memories were later erased.
The record of this deal was hidden thanks to yet another deal, negotiated by the Old One in L'Borean. To find this out, one would have had to enter the deepest recesses of the Shyre Empire, a feat near impossible for anyone. Unfortunately for them, fate must have picked a different fate for me...
